What to do for Urinary Tract Infections in Children ?,Children with a UTI should drink as much as they wish and not be forced to drink large amounts of fluid. The health care provider needs to know if a child is not interested in drinking or is unable to drink.,NIDDK,Urinary Tract Infections in Children
